name: cart-icon
description: Cart is used for viewing all the items added to the cart, allows user to proceed to checkout.

imageSettings.description: Image settings for cart line item

enableHoverCart.description: Show mini cart on mouse over on cart icon.

goToCartButtonTitle.comment: Label for go to cart button. Count = number of items in the cart

totalPriceFormatString.comment: String associated with total price to display. Price = formatted price

productDimensionTypeColor.comment: String that corresponds to the Color Product Dimension Type (1)

productDimensionTypeSize.comment: String that corresponds to the Size Product Dimension Type (3)

productDimensionTypeStyle.comment: String that corresponds to the Style Product Dimension Type (4)

productDimensionTypeConfiguration.comment: String that corresponds to the Style Product Dimension Configuration (2)

quantityDisplayText.comment: String that corresponds to the quantity display text

cartLabel.comment: string to be shown for cart or shopping bag tooltip

flyoutTitle.comment: string to be shown for mini cart flyout
